Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators and platforms from sending push notifications or text message notifications
Summary: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators and platforms from sending push notifications or text message notifications.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting mobile sports wagering operators and platforms from sending push notifications or text message notifications
